title: Can't Login to LoL website on Chrome
body: So this started happening a while ago, and I thought it would fix itself over time, but it never did. I'm really tired of using Edge, it's very slow and ugly. When I click login on the LoL website, the background pops up like it should, but never shows box for actually logging in.

replies.body: Do me a favor and try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) really quickly. Sometimes it seems like that page pulls up the wrong cache or something and just can't proceed.
Didn't seem to work, I'll keep looking for other fixes, but I can't really see any cases where someone has the same problem as me.

Weird, this is just one of those random issues that pop up here and there. Make sure you're resetting Edge's settings even if you're using something like Chrome, because those other browsers still use Edge's settings partially AFAIK. If nothing is helping, try hitting up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if they have any other tricks up their sleeves.
Thanks, I cleared history/cookies on Edge and now everything on chrome works. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Heck yea. Now I've got a little confirmation that this helps for some players ^_^!!!
